Viashino Racketeer.name: Viashino Racketeer

Viashino Racketeer.flavor: "You may call me a fool, selling this stuff on Orzhov turf. Well, you need to be a little reckless to survive."

Mending Touch.name: Mending Touch
Mending Touch.flavor:
"The gift of life must be freely given. Anything less would diminish us all."

—Arin, Selesnya healer

Guildscorn Ward.name: Guildscorn Ward
Guildscorn Ward.text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has protection from multicolored.
Guildscorn Ward.flavor:
"The Gateless have risen. The Ten shall fall."

—Ninth District graffiti

Furious Resistance.name: Furious Resistance
Furious Resistance.text: Target blocking creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Furious Resistance.flavor:
"At least the Gateless rebels have ideals. Rakdos just mocks, defiles, and kills all we hold dear."

—Libuse, Boros sergeant

Verdant Haven.name: Verdant Haven
Verdant Haven.text:
Enchant land

When Verdant Haven enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

Unflinching Courage.name: Unflinching Courage
Unflinching Courage.text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink.
Unflinching Courage.flavor: As Trostani's influence grew, vitality spread through the Conclave—much to the other guilds' dismay.

Riot Piker.name: Riot Piker
Riot Piker.text:
First strike

Riot Piker attacks each turn if able.
Riot Piker.flavor: He doesn't care whether he's rioting about trade rights or just having a drunken brawl. He wakes up every morning eager to smash some heads.

Tablet of the Guilds.name: Tablet of the Guilds
Tablet of the Guilds.text:
As Tablet of the Guilds enters the battlefield, choose two colors.

Whenever you cast a spell, if it's at least one of the chosen colors, you gain 1 life for each of the chosen colors it is.
Tablet of the Guilds.flavor: It is rumored the Azorius paid an exorbitant sum to ensure its symbol would appear at the top.

Opportunity.name: Opportunity
Opportunity.flavor: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."

Cloudfin Raptor.name: Cloudfin Raptor
Cloudfin Raptor.text:
Flying

Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

Orzhov Keyrune.name: Orzhov Keyrune
Orzhov Keyrune.text:
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.

{W}{B}: Orzhov Keyrune becomes a 1/4 white and black Thrull artifact creature with lifelink until end of turn.
Orzhov Keyrune.flavor: You only need to wield it once to appreciate the power of control.

Hover Barrier.name: Hover Barrier
Hover Barrier.flavor: As whispers and rumors increased, so did the demand for fail-safe barriers.

Dark Prophecy.name: Dark Prophecy
Dark Prophecy.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you draw a card and lose 1 life.
Dark Prophecy.flavor: When the bog ran short on small animals, Ekri turned to the surrounding farmlands.

Simic Guildgate.name: Simic Guildgate
Simic Guildgate.text:
Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
Simic Guildgate.flavor: Enter and comprehend the perfection of orchestrated life.

Cinder Elemental.name: Cinder Elemental
Cinder Elemental.text: {X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Cinder Elemental: Cinder Elemental deals X damage to target creature or player.
Cinder Elemental.flavor:
"The old gods awoke and sent fingers of fire to see what was left of the old ways under the endless city."

—Daiva, Gruul storyteller

Nephalia Seakite.name: Nephalia Seakite
Nephalia Seakite.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Flying
Nephalia Seakite.flavor: "Keep one eye on the cliff road or you may fall to your death. Keep one eye on the sky or your death may fall on you."—Manfried Ulmach, Elgaud Master-at-Arms

Scroll Thief.name: Scroll Thief
Scroll Thief.text: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Scroll Thief.flavor: Kapsho merfolk have infiltrated fortresses as remote as the desert citadel in Sunari in their relentless quest for arcane knowledge.

Assassin's Strike.name: Assassin's Strike
Assassin's Strike.text: Destroy target creature. Its controller discards a card.
Assassin's Strike.flavor: When Selesnya missionaries moved into the Shanav Quarter, they faced scorn, ridicule, and ultimately martyrdom.

Barrage of Expendables.name: Barrage of Expendables
Barrage of Expendables.text: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Barrage of Expendables deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Barrage of Expendables.flavor: Goblin generals don't distinguish between troops and ammunition.

Beckon Apparition.name: Beckon Apparition
Beckon Apparition.text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Put a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Beckon Apparition.flavor: The foyer is littered with the coins it demands but can no longer hold.

Manaweft Sliver.name: Manaweft Sliver
Manaweft Sliver.text: Sliver creatures you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
Manaweft Sliver.flavor: "I see in their interconnectedness a strange embodiment of the natural order."—Dionus, elvish archdruid

Vial of Poison.name: Vial of Poison
Vial of Poison.text: {1}, Sacrifice Vial of Poison: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Vial of Poison.flavor: There are worse ways to die, but not many.

Gruul Ragebeast.name: Gruul Ragebeast
Gruul Ragebeast.text: Whenever Gruul Ragebeast or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature fights target creature an opponent controls.
Gruul Ragebeast.flavor:
"If the other guilds want a war, they should know we've been ready the whole time."

—Ruric Thar, Ghor-Clan chieftain

Advocate of the Beast.name: Advocate of the Beast
Advocate of the Beast.text: At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on target Beast creature you control.
Advocate of the Beast.flavor: "I am neither their drover nor their leader. To these majestic beasts, I am simply their herdmate and nothing more."

Chorus of Might.name: Chorus of Might
Chorus of Might.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control and gains trample.
Chorus of Might.flavor:
"In each of us is the strength of all of us."

—Trostani

Ajani, Caller of the Pride.name: Ajani, Caller of the Pride
Ajani, Caller of the Pride.text:
+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.

-3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.

-8: Put X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is your life total.

Glimpse the Future.name: Glimpse the Future
Glimpse the Future.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Glimpse the Future.flavor: "No simple coin toss can solve this riddle. You must think and choose wisely."—Shai Fusan, archmage

Consuming Aberration.name: Consuming Aberration
Consuming Aberration.text:
Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards.

Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.

Splatter Thug.name: Splatter Thug
Splatter Thug.text:
First strike

Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Splatter Thug.flavor: The mask isn't meant to hide his identity. It's meant to keep the viscera out of his eyes.

Disciple of the Old Ways.name: Disciple of the Old Ways
Disciple of the Old Ways.text: {R}: Disciple of the Old Ways gains first strike until end of turn.
Disciple of the Old Ways.flavor: "Selesnya thinks nature is a pretty plaything. True nature would rip their faces off and wear their skins as trophies."

Illness in the Ranks.name: Illness in the Ranks
Illness in the Ranks.flavor:
"Selesnya denied us tribute. Let's show them the error of their ways."

—Milana, Orzhov prelate

Sire of Insanity.name: Sire of Insanity
Sire of Insanity.text: At the beginning of each end step, each player discards his or her hand.
Sire of Insanity.flavor: Its victims become mindless lunatics. Conveniently, that's the first step in joining the Cult of Rakdos.

Armed.name: Armed
Armed.text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn.

Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

Tenement Crasher.name: Tenement Crasher
Tenement Crasher.flavor: Nothing was going to stop it—not the narrow alleys, not the Boros garrison, and certainly not the four-story Orzhov cathedral.

Punish the Enemy.name: Punish the Enemy
Punish the Enemy.text: Punish the Enemy deals 3 damage to target player and 3 damage to target creature.
Punish the Enemy.flavor:
"When justice descends, the servant will burn with the master."

—Aurelia

Goblin Electromancer.name: Goblin Electromancer
Goblin Electromancer.text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Goblin Electromancer.flavor: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."

Bane Alley Blackguard.name: Bane Alley Blackguard
Bane Alley Blackguard.flavor: "I'm in the field of procurement, and business is good. The guilds want all kinds of maps and relics these days, though what they want them for I'm not quite sure."

Smite.name: Smite
Smite.flavor:
"Sure, today of all days, he asked to borrow my boots!"

—Darijo, Ivy Street ruffian

Wild Beastmaster.name: Wild Beastmaster
Wild Beastmaster.text: Whenever Wild Beastmaster attacks, each other creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Wild Beastmaster's power.
Wild Beastmaster.flavor: "When they covered the world in city, all they did was give themselves nowhere to run."

Frenzied Tilling.name: Frenzied Tilling
Frenzied Tilling.text: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
Frenzied Tilling.flavor:
"Izzet contraptions pollute our lands. Burn them down, kill the makers, cleanse the earth."

—Nedja, Gruul shaman

Fall of the Gavel.name: Fall of the Gavel
Fall of the Gavel.text: Counter target spell. You gain 5 life.
Fall of the Gavel.flavor: "My ruling is final. Order is upheld. Justice is done."

Lord of the Void.name: Lord of the Void
Lord of the Void.text:
Flying

Whenever Lord of the Void deals combat damage to a player, exile the top seven cards of that player's library, then put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield under your control.

Razortip Whip.name: Razortip Whip
Razortip Whip.text: {1}, {T}: Razortip Whip deals 1 damage to target opponent.
Razortip Whip.flavor:
"It no longer surprises me what shows up in our raid of a Rakdos revue."

—Janik Bara, Wojek captain

Breaking.name: Breaking
Breaking.text:
Target player puts the top eight cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

Warped Physique.name: Warped Physique
Warped Physique.text: Target creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
Warped Physique.flavor: The Gruul seek unbounded strength. The Dimir deliver cruel irony.

Drainpipe Vermin.name: Drainpipe Vermin
Drainpipe Vermin.text: When Drainpipe Vermin dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player discards a card.
Drainpipe Vermin.flavor: When times are tough, the poor eat the rats. When times are tougher, the rats eat the poor.

Render Silent.name: Render Silent
Render Silent.text: Counter target spell. Its controller can't cast spells this turn.
Render Silent.flavor: "We have confiscated your spells as evidence. Once we conclude our investigation, you may petition to have them returned."

Search Warrant.name: Search Warrant
Search Warrant.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You gain life equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.
Search Warrant.flavor: "And would you care to explain why your satchel is radiating an aura of unstable energy?"

Kraul Warrior.name: Kraul Warrior
Kraul Warrior.text: {5}{G}: Kraul Warrior gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Kraul Warrior.flavor: The insectile kraul lurk in the tunnels below street level. Many are loyal to the Golgari Swarm, but others follow their own esoteric caste system.

Spell Blast.name: Spell Blast
Spell Blast.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)
Spell Blast.flavor: "Perhaps you could try throwing a rock? That might be better suited to your intellect."

Common Bond.name: Common Bond
Common Bond.text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Common Bond.flavor: Wolf riders hone their skills traversing the perilous rooftops, each dizzying step bringing elf and wolf closer together.

Stealer of Secrets.name: Stealer of Secrets
Stealer of Secrets.text: Whenever Stealer of Secrets deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Stealer of Secrets.flavor: The Dimir would hire her, if only they knew where she lived. The Azorius would condemn her, if only they knew her name.

Crowned Ceratok.name: Crowned Ceratok
Crowned Ceratok.text:
Trample

Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
Crowned Ceratok.flavor: The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.

Galerider Sliver.name: Galerider Sliver
Galerider Sliver.text: Sliver creatures you control have flying.
Galerider Sliver.flavor: Masters of adaptation, galeriders serve multiple purposes useful to the hive. When they're not patrolling their territories, their majestic wings serve to circulate cool air through the vast hive chambers.

Bioshift.name: Bioshift
Bioshift.text: Move any number of +1/+1 counters from target creature onto another target creature with the same controller.
Bioshift.flavor:
"It's all right if you change your mind. There's always a chance we can rearrange parts later."

—Zija, Simic mutationist

Ember Beast.name: Ember Beast
Ember Beast.text: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.
Ember Beast.flavor: The only livestock that will survive for long in the Smelting District, ember beasts serve many functions—none of them willingly.

Corpse Hauler.name: Corpse Hauler
Corpse Hauler.text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice Corpse Hauler: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Corpse Hauler.flavor: "He expects a reward, but the only piece of silver he'll get from me is my blade in his gut."—Shelac, necromancer

Death's Approach.name: Death's Approach
Death's Approach.text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard.
Death's Approach.flavor:
"It's cold in the grave, and the dead crave your warmth. Who are you to deny them?"

—Strava, Dimir mage

Domri Rade.name: Domri Rade
Domri Rade.text:
+1: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

-2: Target creature you control fights another target creature.

-7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have double strike, trample, hexproof, and haste."

Korozda Monitor.name: Korozda Monitor
Korozda Monitor.text:
Trample

Scavenge {5}{G}{G} ({5}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

Lightning Talons.name: Lightning Talons
Lightning Talons.text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Lightning Talons.flavor: "The victim was either clawed to death or struck by lightning. Possibly both."—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

Prime Speaker Zegana.name: Prime Speaker Zegana
Prime Speaker Zegana.text:
Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among other creatures you control.

When Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to its power.

Colossal Whale.name: Colossal Whale
Colossal Whale.text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

Whenever Colossal Whale attacks, you may exile target creature defending player controls until Colossal Whale leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

Slaughter Games.name: Slaughter Games
Slaughter Games.text:
Slaughter Games can't be countered by spells or abilities.

Name a nonland card. Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

Dismiss into Dream.name: Dismiss into Dream
Dismiss into Dream.text: Each creature your opponents control is an Illusion in addition to its other types and has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."
Dismiss into Dream.flavor: "You trust in the shadows of a breeze."—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

Indestructibility.name: Indestructibility
Indestructibility.text:
Enchant permanent

Enchanted permanent has indestructible. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy that permanent. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

Beck.name: Beck
Beck.text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield this turn, you may draw a card.

Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

Soulmender.name: Soulmender
Soulmender.flavor: "Healing is more art than magic. Well, there is still quite a bit of magic."

Daring Skyjek.name: Daring Skyjek
Daring Skyjek.text: Battalion — Whenever Daring Skyjek and at least two other creatures attack, Daring Skyjek gains flying until end of turn.
Daring Skyjek.flavor: "The hard part isn't landing in the saddle. The hard part is leaping before you see it."

Shielded Passage.name: Shielded Passage
Shielded Passage.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
Shielded Passage.flavor: Izzet delved into the depths of Ravnica's past, and Selesnya followed without fear.

Frilled Oculus.name: Frilled Oculus
Frilled Oculus.text: {1}{G}: Frilled Oculus gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
Frilled Oculus.flavor:
"Understand the Simic? That's about as easy as winning a staring contest with a homunculus."

—Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

Grisly Spectacle.name: Grisly Spectacle
Grisly Spectacle.text: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Grisly Spectacle.flavor:
"Watch people flock to a murder scene. Then tell me we're not all a little sick in the head."

—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

Devout Invocation.name: Devout Invocation
Devout Invocation.text: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each creature tapped this way.
Devout Invocation.flavor: A prayer to bring demons to their knees.

Marauding Maulhorn.name: Marauding Maulhorn
Marauding Maulhorn.text: Marauding Maulhorn attacks each combat if able unless you control a creature named Advocate of the Beast.
Marauding Maulhorn.flavor: "It's not just you. Everyone makes it angry."—Ardenoth, elvish nature advocate

Scab-Clan Charger.name: Scab-Clan Charger
Scab-Clan Charger.text: Bloodrush — {1}{G}, Discard Scab-Clan Charger: Target attacking creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn.
Scab-Clan Charger.flavor: "The only roads I wish to see are those beaten flat by wild hooves."

Rites of Reaping.name: Rites of Reaping
Rites of Reaping.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
Rites of Reaping.flavor: Don't cross a Devkarin elf unless you long for an early grave.

Urbis Protector.name: Urbis Protector
Urbis Protector.text: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Urbis Protector.flavor:
"I hear that Boros is losing its angels to the Gateless Movement. I'm sure this comes as no surprise to you."

—Teysa, to Lazav

Rumbling Baloth.name: Rumbling Baloth
Rumbling Baloth.flavor: In the dim light beneath the vast trees of Deepglade, baloths prowl in search of prey. Their guttural calls are more felt than heard, but their attack scream carries for miles.

Pilfered Plans.name: Pilfered Plans
Pilfered Plans.text: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Draw two cards.
Pilfered Plans.flavor: Mirko Vosk hunted anyone with knowledge of the maze, draining the chances of the other guilds.

Pithing Needle.name: Pithing Needle
Pithing Needle.text:
As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, name a card.

Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
Pithing Needle.flavor: The fearful want the procedure before a blood festival. The guilty seek it afterward.

Collective Blessing.name: Collective Blessing
Collective Blessing.flavor: Senators of Azorius often hired agents to spy on the Selesnya. They were told to record every spore and root they saw, as each could become a deadly foe.

Fencing Ace.name: Fencing Ace
Fencing Ace.text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
Fencing Ace.flavor: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

Downsize.name: Downsize
Downsize.text:
Target creature you don't control gets -4/-0 until end of turn.

Overload {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

Putrefy.name: Putrefy
Putrefy.text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
Putrefy.flavor:
"We are all decaying, always in a state of near-death. One moment without breath and we begin to break down."

—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

Vitu-Ghazi Guildmage.name: Vitu-Ghazi Guildmage
Vitu-Ghazi Guildmage.text:
{4}{G}{W}: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield.

{2}{G}{W}: Populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
Vitu-Ghazi Guildmage.flavor: "Preachers of freedom forget that conformity can be beautiful."

Overgrown Tomb.name: Overgrown Tomb
Overgrown Tomb.text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.)

As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield tapped.
Overgrown Tomb.flavor: The best funeral shroud is the fabric of new life.

Madcap Skills.name: Madcap Skills
Madcap Skills.text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
Madcap Skills.flavor: The larger the crowd, the harder it is for them to run away.

Sunspire Gatekeepers.name: Sunspire Gatekeepers
Sunspire Gatekeepers.text: When Sunspire Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, put a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance onto the battlefield.
Sunspire Gatekeepers.flavor: "You will pass with respect, or you will not pass at all."

Gideon, Champion of Justice.name: Gideon, Champion of Justice
Gideon, Champion of Justice.text:
+1: Put a loyalty counter on Gideon, Champion of Justice for each creature target opponent controls.

0: Until end of turn, Gideon, Champion of Justice becomes an indestructible Human Soldier creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on him. He's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

-15: Exile all other permanents.

Aurelia's Fury.name: Aurelia's Fury
Aurelia's Fury.text: Aurelia's Fury deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Tap each creature dealt damage this way. Players dealt damage this way can't cast noncreature spells this turn.

Hellhole Flailer.name: Hellhole Flailer
Hellhole Flailer.text:
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

{2}{B}{R}, Sacrifice Hellhole Flailer: Hellhole Flailer deals damage equal to its power to target player.

Ranger's Guile.name: Ranger's Guile
Ranger's Guile.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Ranger's Guile.flavor: "You don't survive in the wild by standing in plain sight."—Garruk Wildspeaker

Sphere of Safety.name: Sphere of Safety
Sphere of Safety.text: Creatures can't attack you or a planeswalker you control unless their controller pays {X} for each of those creatures, where X is the number of enchantments you control.
Sphere of Safety.flavor: The Rakdos believe that all are eager to join their revels, even when told otherwise.

Debt to the Deathless.name: Debt to the Deathless
Debt to the Deathless.text: Each opponent loses two times X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
Debt to the Deathless.flavor: Some of Orzhov's cruelest collectors remember their debtors by taste alone.

Sengir Vampire.name: Sengir Vampire
Sengir Vampire.text:
Flying

Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.
Sengir Vampire.flavor: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

Soul Ransom.name: Soul Ransom
Soul Ransom.text:
Enchant creature

You control enchanted creature.

Discard two cards: Soul Ransom's controller sacrifices it, then draws two cards. Only any opponent may activate this ability.

Mizzium Skin.name: Mizzium Skin
Mizzium Skin.text:
Target creature you control gets +0/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

Overload {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

Golgari Cluestone.name: Golgari Cluestone
Golgari Cluestone.text:
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.

{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Golgari Cluestone: Draw a card.
Golgari Cluestone.flavor: Golgari mold collects whispers, intelligence that is later harvested by Jarad and his high chancellors.

Dawnstrike Paladin.name: Dawnstrike Paladin
Dawnstrike Paladin.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Dawnstrike Paladin.flavor: She crushes darkness beneath her charger's hooves.

Ready.name: Ready
Ready.text:
Creatures you control are indestructible this turn. Untap each creature you control.

Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

Aurelia, the Warleader.name: Aurelia, the Warleader
Aurelia, the Warleader.text:
Flying, vigilance, haste

Whenever Aurelia, the Warleader attacks for the first time each turn, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
Aurelia, the Warleader.flavor: Where Razia was aloof and untouchable, Aurelia is on the frontlines, calling for war.

Bramblecrush.name: Bramblecrush
Bramblecrush.flavor: Nature abhors a lot of things.

Divination.name: Divination
Divination.flavor: "The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you."—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

—Narbulg Nine Fingers

Orzhov Cluestone.text:
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.

{W}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Orzhov Cluestone: Draw a card.

Defender

Flying

Catacomb Slug.name: Catacomb Slug
Catacomb Slug.flavor:

—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

Ogre Slumlord.name: Ogre Slumlord

—Branko One-Ear

Flying

Enchant creature

Flying

—Lazav

Flying

"Break it if you must. The loss of one relic is nothing next to the value of enriching us all."

—Suniel the Woodwise

Boros Cluestone.name: Boros Cluestone

{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

{R}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Boros Cluestone: Draw a card.

Trostani's Judgment.name: Trostani's Judgment

{2}{B}{G}, Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard: Return Rot Farm Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

Door of Destinies.name: Door of Destinies
Door of Destinies.text:
As Door of Destinies enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, put a charge counter on Door of Destinies.

Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1 for each charge counter on Door of Destinies.

Basilica Guards.text:
Defender

Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

{U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Dimir Cluestone: Draw a card.

Boros Charm.name: Boros Charm
Boros Charm.text: Choose one — Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player; or permanents you control are indestructible this turn; or target creature gains double strike until end of turn.
Boros Charm.flavor:

—Aurelia

Dinrova Horror.name: Dinrova Horror

Dinrova Horror.flavor:
"Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits."

—Sign outside Dinrova Building

Shattering Blow.name: Shattering Blow
Shattering Blow.flavor:
"Aurelia seems too eager to solve her problems by delivering them to oblivion."

—Prime Speaker Zegana

Duress.name: Duress

Bronzebeak Moa.name: Bronzebeak Moa

Showstopper.name: Showstopper
Showstopper.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "When this creature dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature an opponent controls."

Rise of the Dark Realms.name: Rise of the Dark Realms

When Lavinia of the Tenth enters the battlefield, detain each nonland permanent your opponents control with converted mana cost 4 or less. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

Goblin Rally.name: Goblin Rally

Goblin Rally.flavor: You don't so much hire goblins as put ideas in their heads.

Shrivel.name: Shrivel

Murmuring Phantasm.name: Murmuring Phantasm

—Lazav

Underworld Connections.text:
Enchant land

Necropolis Regent.text:
Flying

Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

—Lalia, Selesnya dryad

—Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

Flying

Skyblinder Staff.name: Skyblinder Staff

Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked by creatures with flying.

—Strava, Dimir mage

0: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

Cyclonic Rift.name: Cyclonic Rift
Cyclonic Rift.text:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.

Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

Defender
